title: Rule 34

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this rolls, the host must reroll every player into some kind of role that they would be willing to have... *amorous relations* with.
- The host must announce that this role rolled, along with any and all rejected and rerolled roles that would have spawned if this didn't.
- Finally, reroll this role into one that fits the first attribute.

desc:
Post 2004
*Rasen you really should have closed this when you got the chance.*
